Name: Raging Firekin
Story Background: Born from the fury of a volcanic eruption, the Raging Firekin embodies the chaos and destruction of the molten earth.
Ability: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Appearance Description: The Raging Firekin appears as a humanoid figure made entirely of swirling, molten lava and burning embers. Its fiery form exudes intense heat and leaves a trail of scorched earth in its wake.
